definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: This plant requires a positioned in full sun, flourishing in a hot dry location.
sentences.chinese: 性喜陽，需要全光照，在乾燥及酷熱的地方生長良好。

sentences.english: Heliophyte A plant typical of sunny habitats.
sentences.chinese: 是一種典型的喜陽植物。
